import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const Resgister = () => { const [newUser, setNewUser] = useState({ name: "", email: "", password: "", phone: "", }) const handleChange = (e) => { setNewUser({...newUser, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) }; console.log(newUser); return (
